Russia's Navalny is in a prison colony in the Yamal-Nenets region, spokeswoman saysJailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny is in a penal colony in the Yamal-Nenets region of Russia, his spokeswoman Kira Yarmysh said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 12:46:38 GMT ERINHUFTCZN6BLIYPS3LRW54OM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-navalny-is-prison-colony-yamal-nenets-region-spokeswoman-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Eight police injured, 38 detained in Serb opposition protest over electionEight policemen were injured and 38 people detained during and after an opposition protest over election results, Serbia's police said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 11:56:21 GMT AXOGMTIOFBIYXCB2NRXW46CCZU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eight-police-injured-38-detained-serb-opposition-protest-over-election-2023-12-25/Ivana Sekularac世界欧洲
In Christmas Day message, pope decries Gaza's 'appalling harvest' of civilian deathsPope Francis said in his Christmas message on Monday that children dying in wars, including in Gaza, are the "little Jesuses of today" and that Israeli strikes there were reaping an "appalling harvest" of innocent civilians. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 11:24:50 GMT HOZO44OPK5LMXDKKAH4HBZAQKA https://www.reuters.com/world/christmas-day-message-pope-decries-gazas-appalling-harvest-civilian-deaths-2023-12-25/Philip Pullella世界
Kidney patient, 10, separated from family in Gaza, fears he won't see them againNassem Mohra, a 10-year-old kidney patient, fears he may never see his family again after Israeli forces arrested his father while he was taking the boy to a hospital in southern Gaza for urgent dialysis treatment. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 10:15:52 GMT W2PTVZBMFJI2JI5XWRNA7BE6CE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/kidney-病人-10-separated-family-gaza-fears-he-won't-see-them-again-2023-12-25/Fadi Shana, Mohammed Salem世界中东地区
Iran says Swedish court ruling against ex-official 'unjust', to seek his releaseIran said on Monday it would continue efforts to gain the release of a former Iranian official sentenced in Sweden to life in prison for his part in a mass execution of political prisoners in Iran. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 10:02:08 GMT M5GX4BZ2DNOEZAL4QLXJGEJCYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-says-swedish-court-ruling-against-ex-official-unjust-seek-his-release-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东地区
Indian army orders inquiry into alleged civilian deaths in custodyThe Indian army has launched an investigation into the deaths of three civilians allegedly in military custody in Indian Kashmir, and moved senior officers from the disputed area, a military official said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 09:49:14 GMT J2FOYPORCBNB5JMPACFO4ARTXM https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-army-orders-inquiry-into-alleged-civilian-deaths-custody-2023-12-25/Fayaz Bukhari世界印度
Turkey retaliates at home, abroad after troops killed in IraqTurkey said on Monday its air force "neutralised" 26 Kurdish militants in strikes in Syria and northern Iraq in response to the killing of soldiers at the weekend, while authorities also detained dozens of pro-Kurdish opposition activists. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 09:32:29 GMT ZXZVDGFLHBNHXAG2W4AWRYPPNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-retaliates-home-abroad-after-troops-killed-iraq-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukraine received $1.34 bln under World Bank project - finance ministryUkraine received $1.34 billion under the World Bank's public expenditures for administrative capacity endurance in Ukraine, the Ukrainian finance ministry said on Monday. Iran denies US claim it targeted tanker near IndiaIran denied on Monday a U.S. claim that a drone launched from Iran had struck a chemical tanker in the Indian ocean. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 08:47:01 GMT TCA2DDYD4BK5VJ示例https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-denies-us-claim-it-targeted-tankers-near-india-2023-12-25/Reuters世界
Ukraine's air defence destroys 28 out of 31 Russia-launched drones, Kyiv saysRussia launched 31 drones and 2 missiles at Ukraine overnight, mostly targeting the south of the country, with air defences destroying 28 drones and both missiles, the Ukrainian military said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 06:46:53 GMT朗维拉NK7FHBY65CVGKTTII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-air-defence-destroys-28-out-31-Russia-launched-drones-kyiv-says-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian has the upper hand in arms race with the West - Russian minister saysRussia has the upper hand in weapons production over the West and intends to keep the rate of growth high, a top Russian minister said on Monday after both the West and Russia ramped up arms production for the Ukraine war.
